title: FutureContractsInformation
description: Information specific to future contracts, extending derivative common fields

valueTypeCode.description: Identifier code for the presentation form of the economic indicator
valueTypeCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalValueTypeCode

baseCode.description: Number of days in the period used for price calculation or interest correction, e.g., 252, 360, 365

conversionCriteria.description: Type of conversion criteria, for example, linear, exponential, not available
conversionCriteria.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalConversionCriteriaTypeCode

maturityDateTargetPoint.description: This field is used in conjunction with the previous 2 fields (Base and Required Conversion) to allow conversion from rate to price, providing the number of points at maturity for contracts traded in rate

requiredConversionIndicator.description: Indicates if a contract traded in rate should be converted to price

paymentType.description: Identifies the settlement method for the trade
paymentType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalPaymentTypeCode

contractMultiplier.description: Ratio between contract size and commodity quotation quantity

assetQuotationQuantity.description: Indicates the quantity of the commodity on which the trade price is based

openingPositionLimitDate.description: Open position deadline date for the instrument

withdrawalDays.description: Number of withdrawal days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date (inclusive)

workingDays.description: Number of business days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date (inclusive)

calendarDays.description: Number of calendar days, considering the trading date until the contract maturity date (inclusive)
